Desc.entry: Neighbourhood group concerned with improving conditions of life within the areas of Brincliffe, Nether Edge and Sharrow by associating with Sheffield City Council, voluntary organisations and residents. Organises the quarterly Nether Edge Farmer's Market and Fair which helps raise funds for local charities.

ProvisionDaysAndTimes.entry: Monthly (Committee Meeting held in members' homes)

category.entry: COMMUNITY FORUMS AND LOCAL ACTION GROUPS
